Row.Cell: You're an alcoholic. Your Strength, Speed and Vitality are reduced by 3 until you have a drink, plus your stamina is a little slower to recover. Long-term abstinence will cure you.
你是个酒鬼。除非你的酒瘾得到满足，否则你的力量、速度和活力减少3点，并且你的耐力恢复速度减慢。长期戒酒可以治愈该症状。
Increases Strength by 6 and both attack and defence cost 35% less Stamina.
提升6点力量，攻击和防御消耗的耐力均降低35%。
You managed to avoid starvation, overeating and getting drunk for three days. Thanks to maintaining this lifestyle, you gain 10% more XP on Vitality and your Stamina recovers 20% faster.
你在三天内没有挨饿、暴饮暴食与酗酒。由于这种健康的生活方式，活力将额外获得10%的经验，且耐力恢复速度提升20%。
You're fighting barehanded against an armed opponent, this gives you a +5 bonus on your Unarmed Combat skill.
你以徒手之姿，迎战持利器之人，因此徒手格斗技能获得5点加成。
You're a wanted criminal! But you won't make it easy for them because you have a +3 bonus on Strength, +1 to Agility and +3 to Warfare! Effect lasts for 120 seconds.
你成了通缉犯，但你可不会束手就擒！你的力量提升3点，敏捷提升1点，战斗技能提升3点！持续120秒。

You're carrying too much. Your maximum speed is lowered. Offload some items into your horse's inventory, or just drop them on the ground.
 
You can't run and you walk slower.

In combat, your attacks are and dodges are slower, and attacks cost more stamina.

When you're overencumbered, you can't Fast travel, and you can't mount horses.

你负重过多。你的最大移动速度因此降低。把部分物品存入马鞍袋里吧，或是索性丢一部分到地上。
 
你无法奔跑并且你的行走速度减慢。

当你在战斗中时，你的攻击以及闪避速度减慢，并且攻击将消耗更多耐力。

同时你将无法使用“快速旅行”，甚至无法上马。
You're tipsy and that makes you work better! Booze improves your Craftsmanship, just be careful not to cut a finger off!
微醺状态让你工作起来更加高效！酒提高了你的手工艺，不过小心一点，别弄伤手指！
The mischief isn't over yet! You have a +3 bonus on Thievery and +3 on Stealth.
恶作剧还未结束！你获得3点偷窃加成及3点潜行加成。
You hurt your back picking flowers, so you'll be hobbling for a while. Your movement speed is temporarily decreased.
你在采花时扭伤了背部，因此会跛行一段时间。你的移动速度暂时降低。

You were put in the pillory for your crimes. Being publicly humiliated will have an effect on your reputation. You will temporarily be more noticeable and less charismatic.
 

Your Charisma is temporarily decreased by 4.

Your Conspicuousness is temporarily increased by 20.

因犯下罪行，你被拷上了颈手枷。如此境遇会让你声名狼藉。短时间内，你将更为引人注目，魅力也会有所降低。
 

你的魅力暂时降低4点。

你的显眼度暂时增加20点。

You were put in the pillory for your crimes. Being publicly humiliated will have an effect on your reputation. You will temporarily be more noticeable and less charismatic.
 

Your Charisma is temporarily decreased by 6.

你的魅力暂时降低6点。

你的显眼度暂时增加30点。

You were put in the pillory for your crimes. Being publicly humiliated will have an effect on your reputation. You will temporarily be more noticeable and less charismatic.
 

Your Charisma is temporarily decreased by 2.

Your Conspicuousness is temporarily increased by 10.

因犯下罪行，你被拷上了颈手枷。如此境遇会让你声名狼藉。短时间内，你将更为引人注目，魅力也会有所降低。
 

你的魅力暂时降低2点。

你的显眼度暂时增加10点。
Very slowly heals 50 Health and increases Vitality by 1.
非常缓慢地治疗50点生命值并提升1点活力。
Very slowly heals 75 Health and increases Vitality by 2.
非常缓慢地恢复75点生命值，并提升2点活力。
强效曼德拉草药剂效果
Very slowly heals 75 Health, increases Vitality by 3 and unblocked strikes cost 10% less Stamina.
非常缓慢地治疗75点生命，并提升3点活力，且未被格挡的攻击降低10%的耐力消耗。
亨利的曼德拉草药剂效果
非常缓慢地恢复50点生命值。
弱效曼德拉草药剂效果
Alcohol gives you strength, your Unarmed skill is increased.
酒精让你热血沸腾，你的徒手格斗技能得到了提升。
In combat, you're always on the move, tireless and unpredictable. Your Stamina regenerates 15 % faster and you gain a +3 bonus on Warfare.
你在战斗中动如脱兔，不知疲倦，身法难以琢磨。你的耐力恢复速度提高15 %，且获得3点战斗技能加成。

At Nebakov, you got to know the healer Klara, and decided to pass the time with her while waiting for Hans. After collecting some medicinal herbs, you spent a few pleasant moments together in a forest glade. You feel blissful, and you will for quite some time.
 
Your Strength, Agility and Vitality are temporarily increased by 2.

你在内巴科夫结识了医师克拉拉，决定在等待汉斯时与她一起消磨时间。采集了一些草药后，你们在林间草地上度过了愉快的时光。这份幸福感在接下来一段时间内都将萦绕着你。
 
你的力量、敏捷和活力暂时提升2点。
You were tortured at Trosky, and as a result your Agility and Vitality are reduced.
你在特罗斯基遭受拷打，你的力量、敏捷和活力因此降低。
高特弗莱德·奥斯·斯特耶大师
普内维茨的神父康拉德
管家乌尔里希·冯·沙恩伯格
The master barber gave you a proper trim. Thanks to this, your Charisma is temporarily increased by 2.
理发师为你修剪妥帖，因此你的魅力暂时增加2点。
When fighting against superior numbers, you gain a +2 bonus on Strength, Agility, and Warfare skills.
当以寡敌众时，你的力量、敏捷和战斗技能均获得2点加成。

Back in Skalitz, Fritz and Matthew taught you, the best way to fight is to outnumber your opponent. Unfortunately, the wheel of fortune turns and sometimes you find yourself outnumbered. There's nothing for it but to keep a cool head, clean braies and make up for the numerical disadvantage with weapon skills and physical prowess.
在斯卡里茨，弗利兹和马修曾教过你，最好的战斗方式即是以多胜少。可惜的是，风水总会轮流转，有时你也会发现自己陷入了以寡敌众的境地，而你除了保持镇静，别无他法。可别吓尿了，发挥武器技艺，利用好身体优势，从而弥补人数上的劣势。
The blade of a war axe can inflict truly horrific injuries and, with a good blow, even cut off a hand in chain mail.
战斧的利刃能造成可怕的伤势，使出一记猛击，甚至可以砍断链甲之下的手臂。
Airgiyn tav is a Mongolian term for a superb horse. Additionally, you've gained much wisdom from the equestrian traditions of the Eastern steppes.
Airgiyn Tav是蒙古人形容优良马匹的术语。你从东部草原的马术传统习得了诸多知识。
Your Nourishment will decrease 30 % slower, in other words you will last longer without food before hunger starts to bother you.
你的营养下降速度减缓30 %，也就是说，你不容易感到饥饿，你可以在没有进食的情况下坚持更长时间。

The art of asceticism is inherent in hermits, but any pilgrim, serf or traveller knows that lack of food is a fairly common affliction of medieval man. So knowing how to get by on little comes in handy more often than you'd like.
苦行之道本为隐士的天赋，但朝圣者，农奴和旅行者也都知道食物短缺是中世纪常见的问题。所以，在物资短缺的情况下度日的技巧会比你想象的还要有用。

If you don't overeat, get drunk or starve for 3 consecutive days, your stamina will recover 20 % faster and you will gain 10 % more experience in the Vitality stat. If you overeat, get drunk or starve, you will lose the perk effect and will need to reactivate it.
如果你连续3天没有过食，喝醉或挨饿，你的耐力恢复速度提升20 %，你的活力属性经验获取提升10 %。如果你过度饮食，喝醉或挨饿，你将失去该天赋的效果，需要重新将其激活。
Almost every medical treatise emphasizes the importance of balance, avoiding excess, fresh air, healthy diet, and the necessity of physical exercise or appropriate exertion
几乎每本医书都会强调饮食平衡的重要性，适度饮食，呼吸新鲜空气，健康的食谱，再加上适当的体力劳动或身体锻炼。

Medieval law consisted of territorial, municipal, and canonical or ecclesiastical law. Therefore, it's crucial which jurisdiction a particular dispute or its participants belong to. Additionally, the more localized the level of the dispute, the more local customs, practices, and traditions come into play. And it's precisely this, that your nimble tongue and sharp intellect can often exploit.
中世纪法律包括领土法、城市法和教会法，确定该争议或者涉事人属于哪个司法管辖区至关重要。此外，争议内容的地方性越强，本地的风俗、习惯和传统就越能起到作用，正是在这一点上，你的口才和智慧能派上用武之地。
Bandages will be 25 % more effective and the healing effects of food will be doubled. You will recover faster when sleeping, so you will take less time to fully heal.
绷带的效果提升25 %，食物的治愈效果提升一倍，还会睡眠也会提升恢复速度。你会更快地彻底痊愈。

Human health is a complex matter, but even ancient authors have noted, throughout the ages that what happens inside the body is just as important as what happens outside. Sunlight, air, and greenery are considered particularly beneficial resources. You adhere to this principle abundantly, and therefore, medications have a more pronounced effect on you.
人体健康是个复杂的问题，而古代著作家已经注意到身体的内在健康跟外在健康一样，都很重要。人们认为阳光，空气和绿色植物对人体有益，你坚信这一点，因此药物的效用在你身上更加显著。

Medieval medicine is based on the knowledge and writings of ancient philosophers, especially Galen, Avicenna and Hippocrates. It's focus is on the care of the balance of body and spirit and maintaining health practices between rest and physical exercise.
中世纪医学大多基于古代哲学家的知识和著作，比如伽伦，阿维森纳和希波克拉底，他们大多强调身心平衡，保持健康的生活习惯如合理安排锻炼和休息的时间。

You will be able to pray at shrines, crosses and similar places. If you do so, you will receive a buff that can protect you from mortal injury in combat and restore 25 % of your health. The effect lasts for 12 game hours or until you use it.
你可以在神龛、十字架或类似的地方祈祷。祈祷之后，你能抵消战斗中受到的致命伤一次和恢复25 %生命值。该效果可持续12小时游戏时间或是抵消伤害为止。
Reputation recovery for undertaking the Penitential Pilgrimage will be more effective and the buff from the first level of this perk will now last for 24 game hours.
进行忏悔朝圣时声望恢复效果更显著，且该天赋的第一级效果从现在起将持续24小时游戏时间。

Medieval theology can hardly be separated from other sciences and doctrines because it permeated all philosophy, natural science and law. Indeed, every system had to be constructed in such a way that it was in harmony with God's purpose and did not contradict accepted theological precepts.
在中世纪，很难把神学与其他所有学说区分开，因为无论是哲学，自然科学还是法律，都有神学的影子。其实，每种学说体系的构建都需要与神的旨意一致，并且不得违背神学教条。

Theology has been considered the queen of all sciences, for everything is created by God, and its study shapes Christian doctrine, helps illuminate God's purpose for mankind and aids in achieving salvation.
神学凌驾于所有学科之上，因为万物都是上帝创造的。对神学的研究塑造了基督教教义，帮助人们理解上帝的旨意，并实现救赎。
If you use a Battle cry during combat, you deal 10 % more damage. The effect lasts for 20 seconds.
在战斗中使用战吼会使你对敌人造成的伤害提升10 %，该效果持续20秒。
If you use a Battle cry during combat, you deal 15 % more damage in total. The effect lasts for 20 seconds.
在战斗中使用战吼会使你对敌人造成的伤害共计提升15 %，效果持续20秒。
In the heat of combat, your Battle cry is like a dragon's roar, and you slash your enemies as if you were a dragon yourself!
在激烈的战场上，你的战吼仿佛龙吟，你的砍杀彰显龙威！

If you have your dog with you, you will appear more threatening and tough to others. This will show in the Presence and Intimidation skillchecks, but also in combat, as enemies are more likely to give up or run away. And if they don't, they'll have a harder time fighting you.
如果你和狗狗在一起，在他人眼中，你将更为强硬、充满威慑。这也将在你进行威猛或恐吓技能检定时有所体现。而且在战斗时，敌人放弃和逃跑的可能性也将提升。即便他们选择不逃跑，想要击败你也会变得尤其困难。
You may be a blacksmith, but Mutt can act like a butcher's dog and bare his teeth to anyone who gives you a crooked look.
或许你只是个铁匠，但呆呆表现得像屠夫家的狗，它会向任何对你动歪脑经的人龇牙威慑。
If you fight unarmed against an opponent with a weapon, your Unarmed Combat skill will count as 5 points higher.
若赤手空拳与手持武器的对手战斗，你的徒手格斗技能将视为提高5点。
Weapons are overrated. Everyone relies on them and then they're surprised when you punch them in the face.
武器的作用被高估了，如今大家都依仗武器战斗，才会在被你徒手痛扁时大惊小怪。

Alchemical teachings have many domains, and some dangerously approach the dark arts of demonology and necromancy. Therefore, they were forbidden by university masters. However, even a strict prohibition does not deter the curious, such as yourself.
炼金术涵盖许多领域，有些触及恶魔学和死灵术，十分危险，因此大学学者们禁止研究黑魔法。但即使是严格的禁令也无法阻止那些好奇心旺盛的人，比如你。
In combat, you're far more resilient than a mere mortal. Your armour will be 10 points higher at all times.
你在战斗中展现出了超乎常人的韧性，你的护甲永久提高10点。

The ancient hero Siegfried killed the dragon Fafnir and bathed in his blood. That way, no ordinary blade could hurt him. You may not be a dragon slayer, but you may have some of Siegfried's blood in you.
古代英雄西格弗里德杀死了巨龙法夫纳并沐浴在龙血之中。自此，寻常刀剑伤不到他分毫。也许你并非屠龙勇士，但你体内可能流着一些西格弗里德的血。
If you wound an opponent with a war hammer, mace or cudgel, their stamina will recover 15 % slower. The effect lasts for 15 seconds.
如果你用战锤，钉头锤或棍棒伤到对手，其耐力恢复速度将减慢15 %，效果持续15秒。
Let's break that law right now!
是时候做些违法的勾当了！
You can fully utilize the devastating potential of heavy weapons.
你可以充分发挥出重武器毁灭性的潜力。
Heavy weapons can be particularly devastating, and you can make good use of them.
重武器极具破坏力，你懂得好好利用它们。
You can sell the potions you brew for 30 % more.
Making potions is a demanding and prestigious art, but an alchemist still has to make a living. Ideally by selling his potions to travelers - if they can handle them, that is.
制造药剂是门槛极高，且备受尊敬技艺，但是炼金术师也得谋求生计。最理想的方式就是将药剂卖给旅行者们——只要他们能承受得了药剂的效果。
Washing at a tub or pier or taking a bath in a bathhouse will cure 10 points of your health. Plus, if you go to bed clean, you'll heal 25 % faster while you sleep.
在浴盆、码头或澡堂内洗澡可恢复10点生命值。此外，如果你洗净后才上床，睡觉时生命值的恢复速度将提升25 %。

Despite common misconception, medieval man tried to maintain physical cleanliness. He did so within his means, which increased with wealth, social level and availability of bathhouse services. You do so too, because a bath is good for both your body and your spirit.
尽管人们普遍误解该时期卫生条件不佳，但实际上中世纪的男人会在能力范围内努力让身体保持洁净。随着财富、社会地位提升或者澡堂设施的改善，洗澡的频次也会相应改善。你也应当如此，因为洗澡有益于身心健康。
Each successful sword combo significantly reduces your opponent’s agility and strength, making it harder for them to keep fighting and easier for you to defeat them.
每次用剑成功发起连招都会让对方的敏捷与力量显著降低，使他难以继续战斗，更容易成为你的手下败将。
If you can't take out an opponent, especially an armoured one, in one hit, you'll at least leave him shaken and with a reduced ability to continue fighting.
如果你无法一击制敌，尤其是那些穿着盔甲的家伙。但至少你能让他产生动摇的念头，并削弱他的力量。
You know how to make good use of this, and deal 15 % more crushing damage with hunting swords.
你知道如何利用猎刀，你的猎刀造成的伤害提升15 %。
The hunting sword is unique in it's construction. The massive blade is more reminiscent of a knife than a sword – the back side is always flattened and reinforced, giving it more penetrating power.
猎刀结构独特，其厚重的锋刃比起剑更像是刀。它的剑脊平坦而稳固，赋予其更强的穿透力。
Mutt can sniff out enemies and other potential trouble at a much greater distance. This makes it easier to spot and avoid an ambush or other events during fast travel.
呆呆能够从更远的地方嗅出敌人或潜在威胁，这可降低快速旅行期间遭受埋伏或其它危机的风险。
The journey goes faster with a canine companion. And often more safely.
有犬科动物作伴，旅程没那么难熬，一般也会更安全。
After an overhead and left slash, finish your attack with a right slash, hitting the opponent’s face with the pommel of your sword
先举起武器向下挥砍，再使出一记左斩击，最后利用剑柄从右侧攻击对手的面部。
After a right punch then a straight punch, finish the attack with another right punch to the opponent's face.
先出右拳，再出直拳，最后再朝着对手面部打出一记右拳。
Use any short weapon for quick attacks then unexpectedly deliver a blunt strike to the face while moving forward. If you have a shield, use its edge.
使用任意短兵器进行快速攻击，随后向前突进并朝对手面部出其不意地打出一记钝击。持盾时可利用盾牌边缘施展此招。
After attacking from the left leg, lead with the right, then another left strike from below to the opponent's body.
从左腿侧攻击后，再从右腿侧攻击，随后从左下方朝对方身体发动攻击。

使用任意短兵器快速攻击，随后向前突进并朝对手面部出其不意地打出一记钝击。持盾时可利用盾牌边缘施展此招。
After a left and then right strike, finish your attack with another left strike to slip past your opponent's weapon.
先从左侧攻击，接着从右侧攻击，最后绕过对手的武器再从左侧挑击。

从右侧攻击后，再从左侧进攻，最后绕过对手的武器从右侧打出另一击。

先举起武器向下挥砍，再使出一记左斩击，最后利用盾牌边缘从右侧攻击对手的面部。

挥出一记左拳后打出一记直拳，最后打出一次右拳，需要用你的手背击打对手面部。

从右腿侧攻击后，再从左腿侧攻击，随后从右下方朝对方身体发动攻击。

使用任意短兵器快速攻击，随后向前突进并朝对手面部出其不意地打出一记钝击。持盾时可利用盾牌边缘施展此招。
After kicking the opponent in the groin, lean as if losing balance and unexpectedly swing your arm in an inner arc across the opponent's neck.
在踢向对手的裆部后，假装失去平衡，随后手臂向内弯曲并出其不意地挥出，打向对手脖颈。

先从右侧攻击，接着从左侧攻击，最后绕过对手的武器再从右侧挑击。

佯装从上方发动攻击，利用对手格挡的间隙向前迈进，抓住他们的手腕，用兵刃抵住他们的喉咙。另一只手持有火把时亦可发动此招式，但持有盾牌时则无法发动。

As long as you remain still, your Energy and Nourishment will reduce much more slowly.
保持不动时，你的能量和营养值的消耗速度会大幅减缓。
To stop from time to time, to get out of the hustle and bustle of everyday things and just contemplate the world around us. This is one of the paths that lead to wisdom.
偶尔也要停下来，从日常的忙碌中抽身，静静地思考周围的世界。这也是获取智慧的途径之一。
Criminal brands disappear a quarter faster. With the brand scar, you'll sell stolen goods for 10 % more, look more menacing, and gain a +2 bonus on Coerce, Dominate, and Dread.
罪犯烙印消失速度加快四分之一，在带有罪犯烙印时，赃物的卖价提升10 %，且由于你看起来十分危险，强迫、支配和恐吓提升2点。

If you deal damage to an enemy with a ranged weapon, their stamina will regenerate significantly slower, and their combat effectiveness will be further reduced. The negative effect will also last longer.
被你用远程武器击中的敌人耐力恢复速度将大幅下降，且战斗力也会变得更差。该负面效应也会持续更久。
You're really good at hitting sensitive spots and armour weak points.
精准打击敌人的脆弱部位和护甲的薄弱处，这就是你的长处。
The main purpose of archers in battle was not to kill the enemy directly, but to wound and thus weaken or incapacitate them for further combat. You've mastered this skill quite well.
在战斗中，弓箭手的作用并非直接杀死敌人，而是使他们负伤，以此削弱或剥夺其战斗能力。你已经很好地掌握了这种技巧。
The buff from sitting has an increased Comfort effect of 50 %, so you can study faster.
坐下时，舒适效果提升50 %，以此加快你的学习速度。

Among scholars, it is said that for some tasks you need your head, for others your arse, and for some, both. Sometimes wisdom simply needs to be patiently acquired, and indeed, everyone studies better while sitting.
学者们中流传着一种说法，有些事情要用脑，有些事情要用屁股，而有些事情两者都要用。但有时候，获得智慧需要一些耐心，而坐着学习的效果总比站着要好。

The curved blade of the sabre is especially useful for quick slashes, which cut deeper and leave longer and more terrible slashes compared to a long sword. You can exploit the advantages of this design to the detriment of your opponents.
军刀的弯曲刀刃十分适合快速劈砍，它们能比长剑砍出更深、更长、更恐怖的伤口。你可以利用这种设计优势重创对手。

如果你没有穿重甲，你可以做出假动作来迷惑对手，战斗技能获得3点加成。
Your dog is your loyal companion and when it comes to fighting, he is a fierce defender who would give his life for you.
狗是你忠诚的伙伴，遇到打斗，它愿意牺牲自己护你周全。

使用所有武器所要求的敏捷降低2点，通常来说，如果你的敏捷未达到武器要求，该武器将更加难以操控。反之，若你的敏捷更高，则会降低耐力消耗。此天赋能让你得以快速的适应不同的武器。

The required Agility for all weapons will be reduced by 5 overall. In general, if you have a lower Agility than the weapon requires, you will find it more difficult to fight with. If, on the other hand, you have a higher Agility, the stamina difficulty will drop. With this perk, you will reach that state sooner.
使用所有武器所要求的敏捷降低5点，通常来说，如果你的敏捷未达到武器要求，该武器将更加难以操控。反之，若你的敏捷更高，则会降低耐力消耗。此天赋让你得以适应不同的武器。
You wield weapons with ease and natural talent, and you have further honed this skill through diligent training.
你的天赋让你轻松自如地使用武器，而你又通过勤奋的训练进一步磨练该天赋。
When someone brings a knife to a fistfight, you're more than happy to correct them.
如果谁在徒手格斗中带刀，你会很乐意纠正他。
Every morning you gaze at the horizon and wonder what might be beyond it. You are drawn to distant places, like to fill in the blank spots on maps and boldly go where others may not have gone before.
每天清晨时分，你便凝视遥远的地平线，想知道视线的尽头是何物。你被远方深深吸引，想要填补地图上的空白，敢于踏足前人未至之处。

Heroes wear helmets, but even the humblest subject has the sense to get something for his head when his master calls him to arms. It's simple - a good helmet, properly fitted and tied, will save more lives than the most knowledgeable healer.
英豪勇者们总会佩戴头盔，就连身份卑微的臣民在受召入伍时，都知道要弄点什么来保护脑袋。道理很简单——事先佩戴好合适的头盔，比事后奢望顶尖的治疗师来救命要靠谱得多。

In combat, you can use a evasive maneuver. You can perform it by pressing the jump key along with a directional key. You can use it to quickly dodge attacks, move to a safe distance, or even move closer to your opponent. What's more, if you perform a dodge in the timeframe for a Perfect Block, your opponent will lose his balance, and it will be easier to break his defense.
在战斗中，你可以使用闪避动作。同时按下跳跃键和方向键即可执行闪避。你可以利用此招式快速躲避攻击，后退到安全的距离，或者拉近与对手的距离。更重要的是，如果你在完美格挡的间隙内执行闪避，你的对手将会失衡，届时他的防御将更容易被击破。
The saying "Pity the blow that falls short" always puts a cunning smile on your face.
每次听到“没打中，真可惜！”总能让你露出狡猾的微笑。
If you use a one-handed weapon without a shield, attacks will cost 20 % less stamina. Blocking will also cost less stamina and be more effective. This effect works even with a torch in your offhand.
如果你使用单手武器进行战斗，且未装备盾牌，攻击消耗的耐力降低20 %。格挡消耗的耐力也会降低，且变得更加有效。此效果在你另一只手持用火把时亦可生效。

There is no optimal weapon or technique. True mastery means knowing the strengths and weaknesses of each and choosing wisely. Just as knowing the weaknesses and especially the strengths of oneself and using them to their full potential.
世上没有无懈可击的武器或战技，真正的精通则意味着要知晓不同武器或战技的强弱点，并懂得合理运用。正如明了自身的短板与长处，并将长处发挥到极致。

If you use a Battle cry during a fight, not only will it give you courage, but it will also put fear into your enemies' veins. As a result, their morale will decrease and they are more likely to give up, run away or just generally find it harder to fight you.
若你在战斗期间使用战吼，它能为你壮胆，还会威慑敌人。因此，敌人的士气会收到打击，也会更容易投降、逃跑，或觉得自己很难打败你。
Your presence on the battlefield can sew doubt and fear in the hearts and minds of even the most seasoned warriors.
在战场上，即使经验最丰富的战士，你的存在也会让他们感到恐惧、心生退却。
After killing an opponent in close combat, you gain 10 % more attack damage and faster stamina recovery. The effect lasts for 30 seconds.
在近身战斗中击杀一名敌人后，你所造成的伤害以及耐力恢复速度均提升10 %，此效果持续30秒。
There are only a few people who double crossed you twice and lived to talk about it.
背叛了你两次，还有命将此作为谈资的人可是少之又少的。
Your momentary Reading level increased by 3. But your Strength and Warfare skills have each incurred a -1 penalty.
短时间内你的阅读等级+3。但你的力量和战斗技能全部-1
You drink what's flowing, and any kind of swill will do you good. Or at least that's what you think for now.
你什么都喝得下，哪怕是泔水也会对你有好处。至少你现在是这么想的。
Practicing the alchemical craft is a pure joy for you. You can brew for hours without any sign of fatigue.
练习炼金术对你来说是纯粹的乐趣，你可以长时间酿制药水也不觉得累。
You can disappear like steam over a pot. And maybe the pot will disappear with you...
你就像锅炉上的那缕炊烟，能够悄然消散。而且，没准那口锅会跟着你一起消失……
Show me the meaning of haste, horsey!
马儿！让我见识下真正的速度吧！
If you move to attack from one direction but quickly change direction just before your attack, your opponent will have less chance to parry the attack.
如果你佯装从某个方向发起进攻，出手时却迅速改变方向，对手将更难格挡攻击。
In a duel, the first to surprise the opponent with an unexpected maneuver often wins. Knowing a quick feint can help you do that.
在决斗中，利用出其不意的花招先骗到对手的一方往往能获胜。而掌握快速进行佯攻可以帮你实现这一点。
The slashing damage of all melee weapons is increased by an additional 5 %.
所有近战武器的斩击伤害提升额外5 %。
Through much duelling and training you have learned how to slash both lightning fast and with great power. It's a valuable skill that not every swordsman has mastered.
通过大量的决斗和训练，你掌握了以闪电般的速度施展拥有雷霆之力斩击。这项技能十分宝贵，并非每个剑士都能掌握。

Inexperienced fighters often mistakenly assume that strength is the primary determinant in combat. You've learned much and know that precise and swift strikes from the correct distance are more likely to turn the tide in your favor.
经验不足的战士常会错将力量当作能够左右战局的首要因素。而你早已身经百战，你很清楚，要从恰当距离打出精准迅捷的攻击才能将局势掌控在自己手里。
When selling weapons, armour or clothing that are in near-perfect or perfect condition (98-100 %), you'll gain 10 % more money for them.
你售卖完美无缺或几乎零损耗（质量状况为98-100 %）的武器、护甲或是衣物后，将会额外获得10 %的收入。
Quality speaks for itself, but you still know how to help it along.
东西好坏一看就知，但你知道多美言几句也不为过。
Those who face you must somehow deal with your first strike or suffer fierce retaliation. And you are not making it easy for them.
你的敌人必须应对你凶猛无比的第一击，否则就会遭受猛烈的攻击。而你不会让他们好过的。
When you're wanted for a crime, you gain a +5 bonus on Stealth and +3 bonus on Agility and Vitality, making it easier to escape. The effect lasts for 120 seconds.
当你因犯罪而遭受通缉时，你将获得5点潜行加成，以及3点敏捷和活力加成，可助你遁逃。此效果将持续120秒。
Only those who can escape from responsibility can be truly responsible. For then, it is a matter of choice, not necessity.
只有那些能够逃避责任的人才能真正担起责任。因为到那时，责任便是自主选择，而非必然要求。
If you have more than 30 fresh or dried herbs (not spoiled) in your inventory, your Charisma will count as 2 more.
如果你的物品栏里有超过30株新鲜或干燥的草药（已变质的除外），你的魅力值会提升2点。
Wherever you go, you carry a pleasant fragrance with you, as one would expect from a master herbalist.
无论去哪，你身上都散发出令人愉悦的芳香，符合大家心目中草药大师的形象。

The crossbow has more penetrating power than a bow, and can pierce a plate at shorter distances. This is mainly due to the smaller bolt with a larger and heavier tip. In addition, injuries caused by such a bolt are often very serious. This was one of the reasons why the Papal See tried to ban the use of crossbows by Christians against Christians. However Papal bans failed and the crossbow became a common weapon.
弩的穿透力比弓更强，可以在较短距离内穿透板甲，因为弩箭更小，但箭头却更大更重。此外，弩箭造成的伤口往往非常严重，这也是教皇曾试图禁止基督徒使用弩箭互相攻击的原因之一。然而，教皇的禁令失败了，弩现在已经成了一种常见的武器。
When you walk clad in plate armour and armed with a heavy weapon, it looks as if an avenging angel has descended to earth, and you often inspire fear before even raising your weapon.
当你身穿板甲，手持重武器，像一位复仇天使降临人间。往往在你举起武器之前，敌人就因恐惧落荒而逃。

After the first strike in combat, subsequent unarmed attacks will cost you 20 % less stamina and will be 10 % stronger. The effect lasts for 30 seconds.

This perk will also activate after performing a stealth takedown.

在战斗中首次攻击后，后续的徒手攻击耐力消耗降低20 %，伤害提升10 %，效果持续30秒。

此天赋也会在进行潜行偷袭成功后触发。

Even ancient Romans feared Germanic warriors, as they attacked their armored and disciplined ranks in light armour with unprecedented ferocity. While you may not know much about ancient Germans, in battle, your body and mind blaze with a similar ferocity and rage.
就连古罗马军团也会畏惧日耳曼战士，尽管他们只穿着轻甲，但其凶猛的攻击能撕开身着重甲、纪律严明的罗马军队。虽然你对古日耳曼人了解不多，但在战斗中，你散发着与他们同样的凶猛和愤怒。

Legends about the Leshy vary. According to some, they are bloodthirsty beasts, abducting young girls and strangling travelers. Others say they are merely mischievous imps who enjoy leading travelers astray and jump on their necks. Once they've had their fun with the terrified poor souls, they disappear without a trace.
关于林中妖精莱西的传说各不相同。有人说他们是嗜血的野兽，绑架年轻女孩，还会勒死旅行者，还有人说它们只是喜欢搞恶作剧的小精灵，会引诱旅行者迷路然后就跳到他们脖子上。当他们捉弄完那些吓坏的可怜人，就会消失得无影无踪。

Leshy is a Czech forest spectre or demon. It lives deep in the woods, is difficult to spot, and emits piercing, sometimes terrifying, humming sounds. Those who hear it must not respond to its calls, or they risk attracting its attention and possibly sealing their fate. Your Survival skills are so advanced that in many ways, you can rival the Leshy.
莱西是捷克森林里的魂灵或邪魔。它住在密林深处，踪影难觅，会发出刺耳的嗡嗡声，而且那种声音时而还让人感到汗毛直竖。听到那些声音的人绝不能回应它的呼唤，否则就有被它盯上的风险，还可能因此招致厄运。而你的生存技艺卓绝，甚至在很多方面可与莱西比肩。
If you fight with only a one-handed Sword weapon and keep your other hand free except for a torch, you gain a +5 bonus on your Sword Fighting skill.
若你单手持剑进行战斗，且另一只手未持有其它物品（除火把外），你将获得5点的剑术加成。

The term "gladiator" is derived from the short Roman sword, the gladius. However, in the Middle Ages, the term "gladiatores" was used for professional fighters, most often swordsmen. They didn't fight in the sands of the Colosseum, but were often hired as proxies in duels if the law allowed it.
Gladiator（角斗士）一词源自罗马的一种短剑，名为Gladius。但在中世纪，角斗士一词转而被用来指代职业战士，多数是剑士。他们虽不会站在罗马斗兽场的黄沙上进行战斗，但是若得法律允许，他们能够以代理人的身份参与一场决斗。

It's easier for you to convince others the "nice way". You gain +2 to Persuasion, Impression and Presence. People are also more likely to try to solve crimes with you in person rather than going straight for the guard. But beware, the more dangerous you look, the more likely they still choose to go for the guard instead.
你更容易通过用“平和的方式”来说服别人。你的说服、印象和威猛提升2点，人们在犯罪问题上也更倾向于与你私了而非直接去找守卫。但要注意的是，你看起来越危险，人们就越容易去向守卫求助。

Pebbles is your loyal companion you were gifted for saving Lord Capon in Rattay and has been your inseparable companion ever since. You have not heeded the taunts that she excels at nothing, and you have seen good and bad times in her saddle. You have forged a strong bond that nothing can break, and your friendship has awakened in Pebbles the strength and fitness that had long and deeply slumbered within. Now she can boldly compete with the best horses in noble company!
小灰是忠实的伙伴，他是你在拉泰救出卡蓬大人的奖励，从那时起一直和你形影不离。你并不在意别人的奚落，嘲笑她一无所长，但你与她一起经历了风雨，已经建立起了牢不可破的纽带。你们的友谊唤醒了小灰体内蛰伏着的力量与体能。现在，她的实力已经能和贵族最优秀的骏马匹敌了！

Sometimes it's best not to overthink things and choose the most straightforward solution. This approach has proven effective for you many times, and you see no reason to change it. Quite the opposite.
有时候不用想得太复杂，选择最直接的解决方法就好。这种方法已经多次证明对你奏效了，为何要改变呢。反过来想也是一样得。
You have a unique talent. You can piss people off, but then turn it around for the better and laugh it all off. This often comes in handy when haggling over a price.
你有一项独特的才能，总是可以在将人惹怒后平息对方怒气，让对方对此一笑而过。这在讨价还价上颇具效用。
You've spent so much time in the forge pounding on iron that you feel like the hammer weighs nothing. You'll find that skill useful, even outside the forge.
你长年的锻造生涯让你习惯了挥舞铁匠锤, 都可以无视铁锤的重量了，很快你就发现这种技能在铁匠铺之外也十分有用。
You can generally carry less, and whenever you bend to pick up a herb or mushroom, there’s a small chance you’ll strain your back and be left hobbling for a while.
相较正常状态，你负重变少，而且每当你弯腰采草药或摘蘑菇时，你会有小概率拉伤背并因此瘸一阵子。
Every back has a God-given number of times it can bend. Yours is already past its limit.
每个人的背都有上天限定的弯腰次数。而你的背早就超过限度了。
In addition to the usual effects of hunger, starving also reduces your Speech, Charisma, and Intimidation. Moreover, all food will fill you 20% less, and your digestion rate increases by 50%.
除了正常的饥饿效果外，饥饿还会降低你的口才，魅力和恐吓值。并且所有食物都会减少20%的饱腹感，你的消化速度也会随之增加50%。
You feel quite hungry. As soon as you're hungry, all you can think about is food. You're useless, and you don't want to talk to people. All you want to do is eat.
你觉得很饿。一旦饿起来，你满脑子就只想着吃的。你开始摆烂，并且不想跟任何人说话。你只想吃东西。
Your shoes wear down faster, and you generally make more noise.
你的鞋磨损地更快，并且你行动时会发出更多的声音。
You've always been heavy-footed. Ma said it doesn't matter, everyone has their quirks. Fritz and Matthew always said you were a bumbling idiot.
你一直都步履沉重。妈说没关系，谁都有怪怪的地方。但弗利兹和马修说你是个笨手笨脚的智障。

Once you're branded for a crime, the effect is permanent, and getting caught for any other serious crime will lead to your execution. What's more, guards will punish you more severely, and the consequences of these punishments will be more intense.
一旦你因犯罪而被打上烙印，那么效果将是永久的，犯下其他的严重罪行会导致你被直接处死。另外，守卫们会更重地处罚你，而这些处罚所造成的后果也会更加严重。
Tales of the wicked deeds of Henry of Skalitz have preceded you to new lands. The law will keep a closer eye on you.
斯卡里茨的亨利的罪恶轶闻已经广为流传到其他地方。“法律”已经盯上你了。
All your experience gain is 20% slower. All your experience gain is 20% slower.
你的所有经验获取减缓20%。你的所有经验获取减缓20%。
How should I put it? You’re not the sharpest quill in the inkwell. In order for you to understand anything, people will have to repeat it at least twice.
怎么说呢？你可不是墨水瓶里最尖的笔头。为了让你能明白，人们说什么都得至少重复两遍。
Your pickiness causes all food in your inventory to spoil 25% faster. When gutting animals, you’re also pickier and get only half the meat and other items from animals.
你的挑剔使你物品栏内的所有食物腐败速度加快25%。解剖动物时，你也因挑剔而只能获取一半的肉和其他收获。
You'd prefer to only eat your Ma's cooking. Only your Ma's in a better place, so you don't eat much.
你只喜欢妈妈做的菜。只不过你妈不在了，所以你吃得也少了。
Coming across travellers on the road is more dangerous, as is getting into a fight. Besides that, enemies never surrender and are more confident, making fights more difficult.
在路上偶遇旅行者或介入一场战斗时会对你来说更加危险。除此之外，敌人永远不会投降，并且会变得更加自信勇猛而导致战斗变得更艰难。
Take a look at yourself! Pig's eyes, nose like a button. Wouldn't you just punch yourself in the face? Surely you would, and you're not alone.
你看看你这幅尊容！长着对猪眼睛，鼻孔朝天像个纽扣。难道你自己不想对着这张脸来上一拳吧？你肯定想，因为很多人也是这么想的。

You can't ask people for directions, so it's more difficult to find your way around. Besides that, you're too shy to speak to the girls at the bathhouse, so you can't request all of their services. Since you're not much of a talker, gaining Speech skill is also slower.
你不敢找人问路，所以你很难搞清楚你的方向。除此之外，你甚至过于害羞而不敢跟澡堂子里的女人说话，所以你没法要求她们给你提供任何服务。既然你不是个爱说话的人，当然你的口才也会相应更难提升。
You have trouble talking to strangers, so you prefer to avoid doing so.
跟陌生人说话对你来说有困难，所以你更偏向于不这样做。
You lose Energy faster and every time you sleep, there's a chance your sleepwalking legs will take you somewhere else.
你的能量会消耗地更快，并且每次睡觉的时候都有概率会梦游到其他地方。
They say you spend half your life sleeping. That's a good thing. Perhaps the other half won't be so awful.
人们说你半辈子都耗在睡觉上了。这倒算件好事，也许剩下的时间就不会太难熬了。

You get dirty faster, meaning you start to smell faster. And when you do, you can be smelled from twice as far away, making you easier to detect. Plus, perfume doesn't give you any positive effects. You just can't hide this stench.
你身上会脏的更快，也会更快地发臭。你变臭的时候，能在两倍远的地方被闻到，这让你更容易被发现。还有就是，擦香水也不能给你带来任何正向效果。你就是没办法掩盖这股恶臭。
If you were a tanner, nobody would find it odd that you smell awful. Only you're not a tanner.
如果你是个皮匠，那没人会觉得你浑身臭味很奇怪。只不过你不是皮匠。
The weapons you forge will have excellent properties and will therefore take damage 20 % slower.
你锻造的武器将有优异的性能，其受到损伤的速度减缓20 %。
Your father Martin taught you how to temper steel, but later you mastered this demanding blacksmithing skill to the extent that you rarely produce a faulty item.
你的父亲马丁教了你回火钢材的方法，后来你熟练掌握了这项高难度技能，几乎不曾锻出有瑕疵的产品。
Even a skilled warrior can fall to an opponent if he has poor stamina and wears down too easily. You, however, have not forgotten this and continue to hone this essential skill.
一个战士就算再怎么技艺精湛，如果耐力不佳，也会因疲惫而被对手打败。幸好你没有忘记这一点，一直磨炼你的耐力。
You've been through many skirmishes and battles, which has taught you that combat can be lengthy and you need to preserve strength until the very end.
你经历了大大小小的战斗，你深知战斗持续时间可能会很长，需要保存体力直到最后一刻。
A wound that would normally kill you won't, and you'll recover 25 % of your health. Once used, there is a cooldown before the perk can be activated again.
致命伤不会让你丧命，并且你还能恢复25 %的生命值。使用该天赋后，须等冷却时间结束后才可再次使用。
You either have a powerful advocate in the heavens or are simply favored by the fickle Lady Luck.
要么是你有贵人在上，要么就只是得到了难以捉摸的幸运女神的眷顾。
长柄武器受到损坏的速度降低25 %。
Wooden shafts take a beating in battle, so it's a good idea not to skimp on this part of the weapon. You don't want to find yourself in the middle of a battle with a broken pole in your hand.
木制的长柄武器在战斗中很容易受损，因此不要吝啬在这一部分的花销，毕竟你肯定不希望战斗到一半时，手里只剩下一根断掉的棍子。
You grew up in a forge where hard work was never in short supply. And you find a certain satisfaction in it.
你从小在锻炉旁长大，每天都要辛勤的工作，而你在其中得到了满足感。

A poacher usually only cuts the best pieces from the game he kills. He hides them in a poach (hence the name of his dishonest trade) and leaves the rest to waste. However, you know that killing a living creature is not a vain pastime, and if it happens, nothing should go to waste.
偷猎者通常只从猎物中取走最好的部分并藏在袋子里（这也是他们恶名的由来），剩下的就全浪费了。但对你来说，杀死一个活物可不是什么消遣，它们身上任何可用部分都不该被浪费。
If you hit your target in the chest, your shot will deal a total of 25 % more damage. Shots to the heart from behind will also trigger this effect.
如果你射中目标的胸部，该次射击将会额外造成25 %的伤害。从身后射击时该效果也会生效。
When you're in the positivite phase of drunkenness, you gradually gain up to a +4 bonus on your Craftsmanship skill.
当你处于醉酒的正面效果阶段，你的手工艺技能逐渐获得最高4点加成。
Work goes more smoothly with a beer in hand, especially blacksmithing. It's hot at the forge, and staying hydrated is essential for safety.
啤酒在手，工作顺手，铁匠活更是如此。铁匠铺里酷热难耐，因此充足的水分摄入对人身安全至关重要。
Your hands are healthy, you've got skills to spare, you only lack a workshop. You're happy to put your hands to work, especially if it saves you a few groschen.
你的双手无恙，技艺精湛，只是缺一个工坊。要是能省下几个格罗申，你乐意亲自动手。
Your first shot will do 15 % more damage. The perk will be active again after the end of the fight in which it was used or in one minute if no fight took place.
你的首次射击将额外造成15 %的伤害。若你在战斗中激活了此天赋，它将在战斗结束后重新激活；若在非战斗状态下使用，将在1分钟后重新激活。
Your first shot will deal 15 % more damage, for a total of 30 % with the first perk level. The rest of the effect remains unchanged.
你的第一次射击将额外造成15 %伤害，如果你拥有此天赋的第一级，则额外造成30 %伤害。其余效果不变。
Hal shoots first, no matter what anyone says, Hal just shoots first!
哈尔射第一发，不管别人说的什么鬼话，哈尔就是要先发制人！
No tough guy or criminal will come after you because Hal shoots first! Always in self-defense, of course.
粗汉或是罪犯都不敢找你麻烦，因为他们知道你会“先发制人”！当然，仅限于自我防卫。
For every 5 levels of Strength, your Charisma increases by 1.
力量每提升5级，你的魅力就提升1点。
You've built yourself up to look like a reborn Hercules. When you walk by, your muscles ripple and your broad back blocks out the sun. Women gaze at you admiringly, and men look down in envy.
你刻苦锻炼，宛如重生的赫拉克勒斯。每当走在路上，你隆起的肌肉总能引起人群骚动，宽阔的臂膀遮住了大片阳光。女性向你投以欣赏的目光，而男性心生嫉妒又自叹不如。

You can command Mutt to sniff out places of interest or hunted game. To do this, select the "Free!" command. He'll alert you by barking if he finds something. Thanks to your loyal companion, you won't miss a thing.
你可以命令呆呆嗅探可疑地点或是猎物踪迹，只需选择指令“去吧！”即可。如果它发现了什么，就会通过叫声向你警示。多亏了你的忠实伙伴，你不会错过任何事情。
If you inflict a bleeding wound with a Polearm weapon, the wounded person will bleed faster and thus fall sooner.
若你使用长柄武器对他人造成流血伤势，伤者的失血速度将加快，因此会更快倒下。
A polearm is literally a massive piece of iron on a long wooden pole, so by definition it will inflict horrific injuries.
长柄武器就是长木杆和大铁块的结合体，理论上确实能造成恐怖的伤势。
After 10 seconds of fast sprinting, you will briefly get a big bonus on stamina recovery. When you slow down afterwards, you'll quickly regain your strength and can start running again.
冲刺10秒后，短时间内你会获得大量耐力恢复加成，慢下来之后，你能快速的回复体力而且可以再次开始跑。
As an experienced ranger, you can move quickly and not get too tired even when covering long distances or difficult terrain.
作为经验丰富的游侠，不管是长距离跋涉，还是行经困难地形，你都身法矫捷，且不会感到太过疲劳。
You can command Mutt to hunt and send him after wild game. You'll find that he's a great help to you!
你可以命令呆呆去狩猎并追捕野生动物。你会发现它对你很有帮助！
Hunting dogs are highly valued among the gentry. Mutt is far from being one, but once he catches the scent, he does quite well.
狩猎犬备受贵族的重视，尽管呆呆与真正的狩猎犬相差甚远，但一旦它闻到猎物的气味，就会有相当不错的表现。
If you commit a minor crime while drunk, you can try to excuse yourself by claiming your impaired state.
如果你喝醉后犯了轻罪，可以尝试以醉酒为借口来替自己开脱。

They can't catch you sober! Being drunk to the point of unconsciousness makes you useless to them anyway. In pre-modern times, a perpetrator's drunkenness was often considered a mitigating circumstance.
他们抓不到清醒的你！反正，醉到断片的你对他们来说毫无用处。在以前，犯人经常因为醉酒而被轻判。
You can reach into your victim's front pouch when robbing them from behind, but you can still be discovered while you're rummaging around.
从偷窃目标的后方行窃时，你可以将手伸进他们的前口袋。但如果你在里面乱翻，依然能被对方发现。
It's simple, people carry more valuable items in their front pouches because they think it's hard to steal from them. Which is why they don't pay as much attention to them. Get it?
道理很简单——人们习惯把贵重物品放在前口袋中，因为他们觉得那里很难被偷，也因此更少关注前面的口袋。懂了吗？
When attacking with a fully charged attack, such an attack will be slightly faster and 5 % stronger.
发动一记满蓄力的攻击时，此攻击将轻微提速，且威力提升5 %。

An attack from an overhead swing is probably the easiest and most effective for a pole weapon. In formation fighting, this is fully sufficient as a basic attack, so it's good to have this skill at hand.
将长柄武器举起后进行挥击或许是简单有效的攻击方式。非常适合在对阵站中作为基础攻击招式使用，拥有此技能傍身也是很不错的。
Fully charged attacks made from the saddle will be 10 % stronger.
骑马时发动满蓄力攻击的威力将提升10 %。
When you're drunk, your stamina recovers faster. And the drunker you are, the quicker it regenerates, up to a 50 % increase!
喝醉时，你的耐力恢复速度将加快。并且你喝得越醉，耐力恢复速度就越快，最快可提升50 %。

The weight of the armour you wear affects your speed of movement and how much stamina sprinting depletes. Using this perk, your armour will weigh you down 20 lbs less, thus having a lesser effect on your stamina. Neither the actual weight of your armour nor your carrying capacity will change, however.
你所装备的护甲重量会影响你的移动速度以及冲刺时的耐力消耗。获得该天赋后，护甲重量视为减少20 磅，从而减少对耐力消耗的影响。但不会影响你盔甲的真实重量和你的负重情况。

Tales of knights who could barely move under the weight of armour are just silly tales. Nevertheless, armour does weigh something, and an inexperienced fighter can easily tired. You are accustomed to the burden and know how to properly fasten and adjust your armour to limit your movements as little as possible.
骑士在护甲的重压下难以行动？诸如此类的传闻不过是些荒谬的故事。不过，护甲确实有些重量，能轻易让一个经验不足的战士累得气喘吁吁。而你早已习惯了这种负担，并且知道如何正确地系紧和调整护甲，使其尽量不限制你的行动。
A pole weapon may seem unwieldy, but an experienced warrior can wield it with almost the same elegance as a longsword. This is partly because many techniques utilize the same principles
长柄武器看似难以驾驭，但经验丰富的战士却能像使长剑一样，对其运用自如。某种意义上来说，许多战斗技巧背后的原理其实是通用的。
If you hit someone who doesn't know of your presence with a ranged weapon, your target will suffer a combat skill debuff, making them easier to deal with. They might even panic and flee.
如果你在对方没有感知到你的存在的时候，使用远程武器击中了他，他的战斗能力将被削弱，让他更容易被解决。受击的目标甚至可能受惊，并仓皇逃窜。
There are times when you have to prove your skills, but most of the time its enough to just fake it, which you excel at.
虽然有时候你必须证明你的技艺，但大多数时候，只需假装即可，而这正是你的强项。

Each of your subsequent unarmed attacks in an unbroken line will do more damage than the last. The sequence of attacks can be interrupted if your opponent succesfully blocks or dodges the attack, delaying too much between attacks, or by getting hit.

This perk will also activate after performing a stealth takedown.

使用徒手连续攻击时，只要攻击未被中断，每次攻击都会比前一次造成更多伤害。敌人成功的格挡或闪避、你的攻击间隔太长或受击都会中断连击。

此天赋也会在进行潜行偷袭成功后触发。
Many of those who have met you say there's something unusual about you. They just can't quite remember what it is... Or perhaps they've mistaken you for someone else? Who knows?
许多见过你的人都说你有些不寻常的地方。他们只是说不清楚到底是什么……或者他们把你认成其他人了？谁知道呢。
When sleeping in the wilderness, your dog keeps you warm. The bed quality will therefore increase by 20 % but not exceeding 50 % of the bed quality.
在野外睡觉时，你的狗会为你保暖，因此床铺品质提升20 %，但无法使床铺品质超过其总品质的50 %。
If you get your gear repaired by a craftsman, you'll gain a little experience in Craftsmanship. The experience you gain will increase along with the repair price.
如果你让工匠修理你的装备，你将获得少量手工艺经验。修理费用越高，你获得的经验也会越多。
One of the main advantages of polearms is their long range. Therefore, it is of utmost importance to keep the opponent at the right distance.
更长的攻击范围是长柄武器的主要优势之一，因此，和敌人保持合适的距离至关重要。
While armour is primarily for protection, it can give its wearer the dignity he deserves. The iron-clad lord looks as majestic as the king himself.
虽然铠甲的主要用途是防护，但它也会给与穿戴者应有的体面。穿着钢铁板甲的领主便看起来如同国王般威严。
Mastering the basics of mounted combat is a basic part of every squire's training. So don't slack off, and make a good name for yourself and Lord Capon!
每位侍从都应该具备骑马作战的基本能力。因此你不要偷懒，这样才能为自己和卡蓬大人争个好名声！
All attacks made during a clinch will deal 10 % more damage.
与他人扭打时，所有攻击伤害额外提升10 %。
All attacks made during a clinch will deal an additional 15 % more damage.
与他人扭打时，所有攻击伤害提升额外15 %。
You like to close the distance in a fight to make a use of your wrestling skills.
打斗时，你喜欢拉近距离，使出你的摔跤技巧。
You can utilize wrestling skills even in weapon combat, provided you get close enough to your opponent
只要你能靠近对手，即使拿着武器，你也能施展摔跤技巧。
When collecting herbs, you'll also gain a small amount of experience in Strength skill.
采集草药和花园也会使你获得少量力量技能的经验。
Herb forays and digging around in flower gardens are good for you, and you've learned how to combine them with honest training.
采摘草药和翻挖花园对你大有裨益，你已经学会如何将它们和脚踏实地的训练结合起来。
If you were meant to get a hangover while sleeping, now you won't. Plus, when you're drunk, all the beds are 10 % more comfortable, so you sleep like a king.
饮酒后睡觉本会产生宿醉，现在不会了，此外，你喝醉之后，所有床的舒适度提升10 %，你可以睡得像国王一样好！
Have a few nightcaps, and off to bed! The next day, almost no one would realise you'd been drunk as a skunk the night before. That's a kind of art...
晚上小酌几杯，然后上床睡觉！第二天，没人会知道你前一晚喝得烂醉如泥。这姑且也算是一种技艺......
If you defeat an opponent unarmed, your Unarmed Combat skill will count as 3 more and your stamina will recover 25 % faster, making the rest easier to deal with. The effect will last for 30 seconds.
徒手击败敌人后，你的徒手格斗技能提升3点，耐力恢复速度提升25 %，可以更轻松地应对接下来的战斗。该效果持续30秒。

You're able to recognize the difficulty of skillchecks, but not your chances of succeeding. You'll still have to decide for yourself whether it's worth the risk. The effect of your reputation isn't taken into account in the displayed difficulty.
你能判断技能检定的大致难度，但无法知晓成功的几率，而你仍需自行决定是否应当冒险。此技能呈现得技能鉴定难度中，你的声望的影响并没有考虑在内。
Grammar, rhetoric, and dialectics, the three liberal arts taught and cultivated in arts faculties, are essential equipment for anyone who wishes to move mountains with words.
语法，修辞和辩证法是在人文学院中教授和培养的三种重要的人文艺术学科，是任何希望将言辞化为利剑之人必备的工具。
Attacks with Polearms will cost you an additional 10 % less stamina.
使用长柄武器攻击消耗的耐力额外降低10 %。

If you successfully steal any item in the thief minigame, you will always get a few extra groschen. And if you're looting a dead person, you know where to search, thus you can find a bit more money on them.
若你在偷窃小游戏中成功偷走任意物品，可额外获得一些格罗申。此外，你将会在搜刮尸体时从他们身上找到额外的钱财，因为你知道该搜刮哪里。

Booze and gambling go hand in hand and have caused trouble for many an unfortunate soul. But you’ve got it smartly figured out—you don’t own any property, so you can’t lose it recklessly. Without fear, you can have a few drinks and pass the time with a game of dice.
酒精、赌博不分家，这让很多本就不幸的人惹上麻烦了。但你想通了——你身无分文，所以大可鲁莽行事，没什么可失去的。你天不怕地不怕，那便多喝几杯，赌把骰子打发时间吧。
When collecting herbs, you have a chance to find an additional herb or a small treasure.
采集草药时，有几率找到额外草药，或一些小宝藏。
When you perform a combo, you gain +5 to your Swordsmanship skill, making subsequent attacks easier to perform and more powerful. The effect lasts for 30 seconds.
发动连招后，你的剑术将获得5点加成，且后续的攻击更容易发出并威力更大。此效果持续30秒。

If you cook, dry or smoke an unspoiled ingredient or food, after processing it will have a 100 % condition. It does not apply to herbs, as they always have a 100 % condition after drying, regardless of the perk.
如果你烹饪、晒干或烟熏一种未变质的食材或食物，将得到100 %品质的成品。此效果不适用草药，因为无论是否具备相关天赋，晒干后它们始终保持100 %的品质。
You enjoy cooking and love to try new recipes or improve old ones. As a result, you have learned to handle ingredients masterfully.
你享受烹饪，热衷于尝试新菜谱或者优化老菜谱。因此，你处理食材的技艺精湛无比。
Your arrows and bolts have better ballistic properties, so they fly faster, travel farther and have more penetration.
你的箭矢和弩箭性能更好，它们飞得更快，射程更远，穿透力更强。
To perform a master strike, you must attack at the moment of the enemy's attack from the opposite direction. This stops their attack and hits them with your own.
要想发动大师之击，你必须抓准时机，在敌人攻击你的同时从反方向发动攻击，这样不仅能打断敌人攻击还能成功击中他们。

Master strikes, sometimes called secret strikes, are techniques that allow a swordsman, if executed correctly, to parry or stop an opponent's attack while simultaneously striking them. In the Lichtenauer tradition of swordfighting, there are five such strikes, each suitable against different attacks. A true master must not only be able to execute these strikes but also quickly choose the right one to use
大师之击，有时又称作“秘密斩击”，如若使用得当，就可在阻挡敌人攻击的同时击中对方。在利希特瑙尔的剑术传统中有五种与之相关的招式，每种招式皆用于应对不同类型的攻击。真正厉害的大师，不只是能够使出这些招式，还要能针对敌人的攻击迅速选出相应的招式应对。
You can unlock simple locks almost instantly, without the need for mini-game activation or committing a crime. Still, be careful because looting an unlocked chest like this is still a crime.
你几乎可以瞬间就将简易锁头解开，无需进行解锁游戏，也不会惹得罪责加身。尽管如此，还是小心行事，因为盗窃箱内物品始终是一种犯罪行为。
Common locks are no obstacle for you, and you welcome the more complex ones as a worthy challenge.
寻常的锁根本难不倒你，难开的锁才是值得一试地挑战。
The Strength and Agility required to use pole weapons will be reduced by 3.
使用长柄武器所需的力量和敏捷减少3点。
Although any brute can eventually manage a fight with a pole weapon, it's not a bad idea to know the basic principles. You're not a brute, so you didn't underestimate the training.
虽然随便拉个莽汉都能设法使用长柄武器战斗，但要是了解了基础规则，定是如虎添翼。你不是个莽汉，所以你没有低估训练的重要性。
When Fortuna provides, grab with both hands.
幸运女神降临时，一定要牢牢把握机会。
The dirtier you are, the harder it will be for others to spot you. But beware, they can still smell you if the dirt is accompanied by a corresponding odor.
你身上越脏，别人就越难以发现你，但如果你身上的脏污带着臭味，别人还是能闻到你的气味的。
He, who stays on his feet, drinks below his means. You've had your fill, so you know how to make a drunk's hangover as mild as possible.
还能站着就代表喝得不够。你是这方面的老手了，所以清楚如何最大程度地缓和宿醉。
The owl Minerva flies out at dusk and the Skalitz falcon often follows her.
密涅瓦猫头鹰常于黄昏出没，斯卡里茨猎鹰则会尾随其后。
When your horse is nearly out of stamina, you can spur it on with $horse_perk_no_rest_for_the_wicked; to recover some of it. Perk has a 120 second cooldown before you can use it again.
如果你的马的耐力即将耗尽，你可以按$horse_perk_no_rest_for_the_wicked; 来鞭策它，以此恢复些许耐力。该技能冷却时间为120秒。
A skilled rider knows how to properly spur a horse and get the most out of it. But a good rider also knows not to do it too often, and to give the horse a rest and reward him for obedience.
熟练的骑手知道如何鞭策马匹，使其充分发挥潜力。但优秀的骑手也知道不能经常这么做。他们懂得让马适当休息，并因为它们服从命令而给予奖励。
You've long known that life is a struggle, and it's rarely fair. Unexpected twists and adverse circumstances are not only expected, but welcomed, because your victories are all the more glorious!
你早就明白生活是一场斗争，鲜少有公平可言。但即便是意料之外的曲折与窘境依然值得期待和向往，因为最终的胜利只会更加的辉煌！
You have achieved a true and renowned mastery of shooting. Your only concern is having enough ammunition, because only the most armoured enemies withstand your fire.
你已经是名副其实的射击大师。现在你只需要关心弹药是否足够，因为只有全副武装的敌人才能经受得住你的火力。

If an opponent defends against your attempt to stun or stealth kill them, they will suffer penalties to their stats. This will make it easier for you to defeat them conventionally. The effect lasts for 20 seconds.
如果对手成功阻止了你击晕或者暗杀他，其属性值将暂时减少，使你更容易用常规方法击败他们。效果持续20秒。

Though a rider can traverse open country, paved roads are safer for the horse, it doesn't tire as quickly, and can run faster. This is generally true, but you've learned to lead your animal in a way that truly takes advantage of the benefits of roads.
骑手虽能在开阔乡间穿梭自如，但对于马儿来说，铺平的道路才更为安全。在路上行进，马儿便不会过快疲倦，且跑得更快。事实确实如此，而你也学会了将马儿引到路上，充分利用道路所能提供的益处。
If you successfully wound an opponent by a strike to an uncovered zone (i.e. a zone your opponent isn't blocking from), it will be more difficult for the opponent to block your subsequent attacks.
如果你成功击伤对手的无防备区域（即对手没有试图格挡的地方），对手将更难格挡你的后续攻击。
The effect of a successful opening strike will be greatly enhanced.
大大提升锋不可当一代的效果。
The first strike doesn't have to be the final one. Instead, your intention may be to prepare your opponent, especially if he is armored, so that you can strike a powerful blow later.
没必要强求一击毙命，甚至可以让对方有个心理准备，尤其当他穿着盔甲的时候，你才能在之后发出强有力的一击。
When you're in the positive phase of drunkenness, you got a bonus of up to +4 to Thievery.
当你处于醉酒的正面效果时，你的偷窃获得4点加成。
If you lose Reputation, the drop will be 10 % less.
如果你失去声望，声望减少速度降低10 %。
He who is a friend to all is a friend to none. You can be a friend to anyone when it suits you, but you are a true friend especially to yourself.
交友满天下知心无一人。有需要时，你可以和任何人称兄道弟，但你才是你自己的真正盟友。

As long as you don't kill anyone, your non-combat skills will be increased by 2 and your Speech by 3. If you kill someone, you lose the bonus but can regain it if you don't kill anyone for 12 game hours.
只要维持不杀人，你的非战斗技能提升2点，口才提升3点。杀人之后你将失去此增益效果，但如果在十二个游戏小时内不再次杀人，就可重新获得该增益。
War is an old man's quarrel in which the young die and the country suffers. You've had enough, and want no part in the squandering of more lives.
战争源于老顽固们之间的争端，却要青年们为此付出生命的代价，国家也因此受创。你受够了这一切，不愿夺取别人的性命。

After performing a combo with a warhammer, mace or club, the affected enemy will not be able to perform a Dodge or a Master strike, and generally his ability to defend himself will be greatly reduced. The effect will last for 20 seconds.
使用战锤、钉头锤或棍棒发动连击后，被击中的敌人将无法闪避或使用大师之击，其整体防守力道会显著降低。此效果持续20秒。
If a fool dares stand up to you, you're more than willing to show him what a terrible mistake it was.
要是哪个蠢货胆敢跟你作对，你非常乐意给他点教训，叫他知道他做了什么蠢事。
The optimal block is one that is executed using the smallest necessary movement. This makes it fast, reliable, and opens up the possibility of immediately transitioning into a counterattack.
格挡动作越小越好，这能让格挡快速而可靠，同时还能为你创造立即将格挡转为反击的机会。
Each level of Vitality adds 1 extra Stamina point. The effect also applies retroactively.
活力每提高1级，耐力将额外增加1点，耐力增加点数取决于当前活力等级。
Back home in Skalitz, you learned how to sneak into bed, even properly boozed up, so as not to wake your parents.
在斯卡里茨的家里，你学会了如何在喝醉时悄悄爬回床上，不吵醒熟睡的父母。
Stealthy movement is almost second nature to you and you are able to retain much of your agility and ease of movement.
你仿佛生来就会潜行，你能保持一定的灵活行和轻松移动的能力。
Poaching is a dangerous trade, and the quest for rare herbs can be too. It is therefore necessary to know how to monetise your time and effort appropriately.
偷猎十分危险，寻找稀有草药同样危险。因此，懂得怎么把付出的时间和努力变现很有必要。
When using a dose of poison on arrows, you can poison more of them, and it lasts longer on your weapon.
你仅用一剂毒药就能给多支箭矢淬毒，毒素在武器上的残留时间更长。
With a fully charged sword attack, your Sword Fighting skill will count 3 higher. So your attack will not only be stronger, but it will also be harder to parry.
用剑蓄满力后发动攻击，你的剑术将提升3点。你的攻击将因此威力更强，且还更难抵挡。
Fortune favours the bold, that is certainly true, but it often favours the prudent too. And when it comes to swordfighting, you can be prudent and not rush your attack unnecessarily.
天助勇者，此乃至真之言，但神明也常常会眷顾谨慎之人。每每身处剑斗之中，你就应当保持谨慎，别因操之过急而发动不必要的攻击。
When you drink, things start happening. But surprisingly, nothing serious has ever happened to you.
当你开始喝酒，就会出事。不过令人称奇的是，你一直没有出什么严重的意外。
When you're in the positive phase of drunkenness, you'll get a bonus of up to +4 to your Unarmed combat skill.
当你处于酒醉增益状态时，你的徒手格斗技巧获得4点加成。
If you take a drink, your fists start to itch. Wherever your alcohol-fuelled blow falls, the hair won't grow back for a while.
喝上几杯，你的拳头就开始痒了，无论你上了酒劲拳头砸在哪，对方那个地方的毛发暂时是长不回来了。
You feel more alive than ever after taking it!
喝药后，你感觉比以前更有活力了！
If you fail to steal an item when pickpocketing, you won't be detected by your victim. This perk has a 3 minute cooldown before it can be used again.
如果你行窃失败，受害者不会发现你。使用此天赋后，须等三分钟的冷却时间结束后才可再次使用。
Better to let go of the line than to capsize the boat.
该放弃的时候就放弃，总好过把自己都搭进去。
You can be very stealthy when picking locks or pickpocketing people. From a distance, no one will notice anything.
在撬锁或扒窃时，你的动作变得非常隐秘，在远处根本看不出端倪。
The smoldering ruins of your native Skalitz have ignited an unyielding flame of fierce and righteous vengeance within you. May God have mercy on anyone who faces this flame.
你故乡斯卡里茨的余烬点燃了你心中不息的怒火和复仇之火。愿上帝怜悯任何将被这火焰燃尽的敌人。

If you sharpen a weapon on the grindstone to a condition of 98 % or higher, the weapon gains a bonus effect that increases its slashing damage by 10 %. This effect will remain active as long as the weapon’s condition stays above 75 %.
如果你用磨刀石将武器的状况提升至98 %或更高，该武器将获得增益效果，使其斩击伤害提高10 %。只要武器的状况保持在75 %以上，这个效果将一直生效。
Anyone who does not know how to take care of a sword, and especially its blade, should not wield such a weapon and would do better to hang a club on his belt.
不懂如何保养剑、尤其是剑刃的那些人，不配拥有这种武器。对他们来说，不如带一根棒子。

You got Herring from Lord Bergow at Trosky. You guess they picked him for you because he wasn't one of the best and nobody really wanted him. In many ways he reminded you of yourself, and you have a soft spot and sympathy for Herring and his ilk. You jumped to the saddle in spite of everyone, and Herring has accompanied you faithfully ever since. You're glad you helped him find his place in the world, and he has repaid you. In fact, he's a great horse, just smart enough not to work hard for someone who isn't worth it.

你是在特罗斯基从冯·波尔高领主手里得到了“鲱鱼”。大概是因为“鲱鱼”不够优秀，没有人想要它，因此它才到了你的手上。在很多方面，你似乎在它身上看到了自己的影子，而且你对“鲱鱼”及其同类均抱有同情和好感。因此在众人面前，你还是决意跳上它的马背，自那时起，“鲱鱼”便陪伴着你，忠诚不离。你很高兴能帮助它在世界上找到容身之所，而它也回报了你。事实上，它还真是一匹好马，而且聪明到不会为任何不值得的人付出努力。

When both you and your opponent are unarmed, you can perform a chokehold from a clinch to knock out your opponent. You can do this by attacking from the left zone while in clinch. If your attack is successful, you will perform an arm lock, after which you can attack again to perform a chokehold.
当你和对手都没有装备武器时，你可以在缠斗时施展锁喉并将对手击昏，缠斗时通过攻击左侧区域即可发动这一招式。如果成功击中对手，你可以对他进行锁臂，随后再次攻击，即可施展锁喉。

Leverage, chokeholds, overpowering, throwing, using your center of gravity. These are all important aspects of ringen, a medieval wrestling art. Knowing it, you can handle opponents in many ways, depending on the moment.
调整你的重心，利用锁喉、压倒、投掷等动作压制对手。这些都是中世纪摔跤术（Ringen）的重要技巧，只要将其掌握，你就能通过多种方式，见招拆招地打败敌人。
When you are in human settlements or their immediate vicinity, your Stealth skill will count as 3 higher.
当你在人类居住区及其周边时，潜行提升3点。
Many times you have escaped death or other misfortune thanks to early warning or quick getaway. You value your quick feet and use them as much as you can.
多亏了预警和逃跑的能力，你才能多次死里逃生或者躲避祸事，你很重视你的速度，并尽可能地利用这个优势。
If you're in the saddle, the Stamina depletion for aiming with a ranged weapon will be halved.
骑马时，以远程武器瞄准目标的耐力消耗减半。
Mounted archers were used primarily for patrols, quick ambushes and weakening the advancing enemy. Due to the need to master both riding and shooting, they were usually well paid and valued.
骑射手主要用于巡逻、快速伏击和削弱进攻的敌人。由于需要同时掌握骑术和射术，他们通常享有丰厚的报酬且备受重视。
It'll generally be easier for you to knock out or to stealth kill someone.
你将更容易击晕或暗杀敌人。
If you follow the recipe precisely and your brewing time is perfect, you can brew potions of exceptional quality, which the ordinary herbalist can only dream of.
如果你严格遵照配方的指示，且熬制时间恰到好处，你将可熬制出品质超凡的药剂，是那些普通草药师梦寐以求之物。
You have achieved extraordinary skill in the Alchemy craft and distillation.
你在炼金术和蒸馏技能上取得了非凡的成就。
The brewing process will be more tolerant of minor errors, making it easier to achieve better quality potions.
调制过程对小错误的容错率更高，使你更容易制作出高品质的药剂。
In the brewing process, tolerance for your mistakes will be considerable. If you also have the first level of this perk, the effects stack and the resulting advantage will be even greater.
调制过程中，容错率会更高。如果你拥有该天赋的第一级，它们的效果会叠加，你将获得更大的优势。
The preparation of alchemical potions is a transcendental experience for you. You are constantly looking for ways to improve your recipes to achieve perfect balance and metaphysical parity.
对你来说，调制炼金药水是一种超然的体验，你不断地改进配方，以达到完美的平衡和形而上的和谐。

Practice makes perfect, and any theoretical knowledge is only half as good without practice. You are very precise in brewing potions and have no difficulty achieving the necessary balance of elements.
实践出真知，任何理论知识没有实践都只能算是只说对一半。你在调制时一丝不苟，能轻松达到元素间的平衡。
Combining substances and measuring ratios and quantities is your domain.
你尤为擅长测量材料重量、比例并将其组合。
You've been around horses for a while now, and because of your affinity for the craft, you've quickly learned a lot about saddles, harnesses and other equestrian gear.
你和马匹相处了一段时间，对它们的热爱让你很快学会了很多关于马鞍、挽具和其它马术装备的知识。
If you wear boots repaired by yourself, sprinting will cost you 25 % less Stamina, so you can run longer and go further.
如果你装备的鞋子是你亲自修补过的，你冲刺消耗的耐力将减少25 %，可以使你冲刺更久，跑得更远。
If you put on self-repaired boots, the sprint will cost you 50 % less stamina, so you can sprint longer and run further.
如果你装备的鞋子是你亲自修补过的，你冲刺消耗的耐力将减少50 %，可以使你冲刺更久，跑得更远。
Your heavy weapon attacks will be harder for opponents to block with a shield. Additionally, it will take less time to completely destroy an opponent's shield with your blows.
当你使用重武器攻击时，让对手更难持盾进行格挡，另外，你的攻击能更快的摧毁对手的盾。
If the opponent hides behind a shield, you have no problem smashing that first and then the poor guy behind it. Unless he runs away first.
如果对手缩在盾牌后面，先打碎盾牌，再干掉那个可怜虫，对你来说绝非难事。除非他早就逃走了。
You're almost silent when using a lockpick, and if it happens to break, the sound will be 75 % quieter.
你使用撬锁器时几近无声，弄坏撬锁器时发出的声音减弱75 %。
You're so good at lockpicking that you even know how to mess it up correctly.
你太擅长撬锁了，以至于就算搞砸了，你也知道如何安然处理。
You get a +4 Speech bonus when haggling, making it easier to negotiate better prices.
议价时你的口才将获得4点加成，使你更容易谈到更好的价格。
After a shot from a bow while on foot, your stamina will recover 25 % faster and sprinting will cost 50 % less stamina, making it easier to move or flee. The effect lasts for 10s.
步行时使用弓射击后，你的耐力恢复速度提升25 %，冲刺所消耗的耐力减少50 %，能助你移动或逃跑。此效果持续10秒。

Skirmishers, sometimes referred to as the vanguard, were typically light infantry archers whose tasks were to inflict losses on the enemy before the main battle, conduct reconnaissance, secure the flanks or rear, or perform quick strikes followed by withdrawal. You have also mastered this art.
游击者，时而被称为先锋，通常是轻步兵弓箭手，负责在主要战斗前痛击敌人、执行侦察任务、保护军队侧翼或后方，抑或是在大部队撤退前进行攻击。而你也精通这门战技。
Your horse will deplete stamina 5 % slower, you will see 15 % further when using fast travel and you will have a better chance to react to events on the road or avoid them altogether.
你的马耐力消耗速度降低5 %，在快速旅行时你的视野提升15 %，使你更容易对路上的突发事件做出反应，或避开它们。
If you get an opportunity to attack, you can ovewhelm your opponent with a chain of blows, not allowing him to counterattack and eventually break through his defenses.
一旦抓住机会，你就会用暴风雨般的连续攻击压到对手，让他无法反击，并最终突破他的防御。
Armour and clothing that you repair yourself with the Armourer's kit will make less noise when worn. The effect lasts until the item's quality level drops.
使用军械师工具包修复的护甲和衣物在穿着时所产生的噪音将减弱，该效果持续到物品的质量下降为止。
Every enemy killed from the saddle increases your horse's morale, so it won't falter easily in battle.
在骑乘时每次杀死敌人都会给你的马增加士气，这样它在战斗中就不会轻易畏缩。
After executing a combo or master strike in unarmed combat, you immediately regain some of your stamina.
在徒手格斗中完成连招或大师一击可立即恢复一些耐力。
Blocks will cost you 20 % less stamina and your shield and weapon will wear down 20 % slower by blocking.
格挡消耗的耐力降低20 %，且格挡时盾牌与武器损耗下降20 %。
As has been said many times before, it's important to tire your opponent in battle and to retain enough strength to defeat him. This skill will help you to parry even powerful blows with ease.
之前已提过多次，在战斗中消耗对手体力且自身保留足够精力将其击败非常重要。即便是面对强力的攻击，此项技巧亦能让你招架自如。
If you don't move for 2 or more seconds while aiming, your stamina will drain 20 % slower, and your shot will be 15 % stronger.
若你在瞄准时保持不动，并持续时间超过2秒，你的耐力消耗速度将降低20 %，射击威力将提升15 %。
Even though shooting is routine for you, you are still patient with every shot and you waste very few arrows.
尽管射击对你来说已是家常便饭，但你依然会在每次射击中保持耐心，几乎不浪费箭矢。

If you have a dagger equipped, you can perform a stealth kill maneuver. All you have to do is sneak up behind your unsuspecting victim and initiate a chokehold. Then be ready to press the attack to deliver the killing blow. May God have mercy on your soul.
如果你装备了匕首，即可发动暗杀。你只需潜行至毫无戒备的目标身后，发动锁喉，随后准备好按下攻击键，发动致命一击。愿上帝怜悯你的灵魂。

You can stealthily knock people out. To do this, sneak up to your victim and initiate a chokehold. Then be ready to press attack to finish the action and knock out your opponent. It's a good idea to then hide the unconscious body so nobody stumbles across it. Your victim will regain consciousness after some time, so whatever it is you're up to, make it quick.
你可以悄悄地将人击晕，要做到这一点，只需悄悄接近目标并发动锁喉动作，随后准备按下攻击键并将目标击晕。最好将昏迷的目标藏起来，以免他人发现。你的目标会在一段时间后恢复神智，所以无论你有何计划，要速战速决。
It's not about strength alone, you also have to be able to distribute the load well so you don't get tired too soon. You understand that, and know how to do it.
负重不只是力量问题，你还需要合理地分配负重，这样才不会很快就累了。你深知这一点，也知晓该如何去做。

You’ve taught Mutt to create a ruckus and draw attention to himself. This can be handy, especially when you need to sneak somewhere unnoticed. You can get him to bark by selecting the relevant command under Commands. Mutt will start barking on the spot, so make yourself scarce quickly to pull off your ruse.
你已经教会了呆呆如何制造骚乱，以此吸引人们的注意。当你需要悄无声息地溜进某个地方时，这会带来不少便利。你可以通过在动作菜单中选择相关指令来让它吠叫。呆呆会在原地开始狂吠，你可趁机抓紧时间行动！

Wild men or woodwoses were popular supernatural figures in the Middle Ages, widespread across Europe. They inhabit forests and wild lands and are not considered downright evil, but rather mischievous, sometimes malicious and wary of man, sometimes playful and helpful. They often served as a heraldic motif or as a villain figure in courtly games.
森林野人这类是盛行于中世纪的超自然生物，相关传说在欧洲各地广泛流传着。他们居住在森林和荒野中，他们并非完全邪恶，而是有些调皮捣蛋。有时他们对人类心存戒备、含有恶意，有时又十分顽皮、乐于助人。他们也经常被绘在纹章上或者被作为反派出场在宫廷游戏中。
No distance poses a challenge for you; no horizon is too far. Among other reasons, because you are exceptionally enduring.
天涯海角你都能轻易抵达，地平线也并非遥不可及。没别的原因，只因你拥有超凡的耐力。
Armored opponents are easier to deal with than ever before!
如今，穿盔甲的对手更好对付了！
Heavy weapons are most suitable for fighting armoured enemies and in the hands of a skilled warrior the best armour or plate can't stop them.
重武器最适合用于对付身穿盔甲的敌人，而且，当它由一名武艺高强的战士挥舞时，就算是最坚硬的护甲都无法抵挡其攻势。
Your Craftsmanship level will count as 3 levels higher during blacksmithing, and all sword-like weapons will get 25 % less damaged in combat.
在锻造时，你的手工艺等级被视为提升3级，你的剑类武器在战斗中耗损减少25 %。
If you gain Reputation, the increase will be 10 % higher.
如果你获得声望，其获取量将提升10 %。

Now you will be able to forge weapons of the fourth, i.e. the highest quality. Weapons of this quality cannot be obtained in any other way than by forging them yourself, and their strength and effectiveness is unmatched.
现在你可以锻造第四级，也就是品质最佳的武器。此等级的武器只能通过亲自锻造获得，它们的强度和效果都无可匹敌。
Hitting a target unaware of you will deal 20 % more damage.
当目标没有察觉到你，对其造成20 %额外伤害。

You can tell which stolen items are considered stolen in the location you’re currently in.

The red hand icon indicates items considered stolen in your current location.

The grey hand indicates those that are not considered stolen in this location. Such items can be sold to a merchant without worry, and guards won’t confiscate them during a search.

你可以知晓当前所在区域的被盗窃物品是否会被视为赃物。

红手标志代表物品在你当前区域中被视为赃物

灰手标志代表在当前区域内不会视为赃物。这类物品能放心地卖给商人，守卫也不会在搜查时没收它们。
Porridge needn't be eaten as hot as it is cooked. And you know when it's the right time to eat.
粥绝不能煮好了就吃，而你很清楚出手的最佳时机。
Your gear will be damaged 10 % slower, so you don't have to repair it as often.
你的装备损坏速度减缓10 %，以降低修理的频率。
Good preparation makes a master and you know it! You take good care of your equipment and don't neglect anything. Your father, Martin would be proud.
充足的准备是成功的基石，而你深知这一点！你妥善地保养你的装备，不会忽略任何细节。你的父亲马丁会为你感到骄傲的。
Bombarding the enemy with blows may not be a bad tactic. But sometimes it can be even better to wait for the right moment and then strike a devastating blow with all your might.
向敌人连续猛攻是不错的战术。但有时，看准时机全力给对手猛烈一击更具奇效。
You can stab with a polearm so hard that you could drive a spear through a full-grown boar.
你在使用长柄武器发动刺击时力道惊人，成年野猪都能被你一击刺穿。
You can lean into a spike properly and use the full potential of a long weapon.
你可以有效地将力量集中在长柄武器的尖端，充分发挥其威力。
The higher your Strength skill, the easier it'll be for you to knock someone out or kill them stealthily.
你的力量技能越高，就越容易暗中击昏或杀死敌人。
Physical superiority over an opponent is always useful, even outside of direct combat. You just have to know how to use it properly, which you know very well.
对付敌人时，体能优势总是有用处的，甚至在战斗之外，只要懂得善用此优势就好，而你正好精通此道。
After the first 30 seconds of unarmed combat, your attacks will be 30 % stronger and your stamina will recover 30 % faster.
徒手格斗开始30秒后，你的攻击威力提升30 %，且耐力恢复速度提升30 %。
You take pride in your equipment and take good care of it, because the right tool and thorough preparation are half the success.
你以你的装备为荣，并且悉心保养它们。毕竟，正确的工具和充分的准备就成功了一半。
After a combo, the target opponent's stamina will regenerate slower, thus their fighting ability will be reduced.
使出连招后，目标敌人的耐力恢复速度会减慢，从而降低他们的战斗能力。
Spikes and hooks on polearms are not just for decoration. They are used to pull riders from their saddles, trip their legs, hook shields or folds in plate armour and other similar tactics.
长柄武器上的尖刺和钩子可不是装饰，而是用来拉对手下马鞍，绊倒步兵的腿、钩住盾牌或板甲上的缝隙等用途。
Stolen weapons, armour and clothing in your inventory will lose their stolen status 20 % faster.
你物品栏中偷来的武器、护甲以及衣服，它们脱离被盗状态的速度将加快20 %。

Change a tip, adjust a buckle, re-stitch a seam, loosen a thread here and there... And behold, that scabbard no longer resembles the one the wealthy nobleman wore yesterday. With a bit of finesse, you can alter things so that not even their rightful owner would recognize them!
换个尖儿，改个纽扣，重新缝一缝接缝处，要不就随处松动些丝线……瞧，那只剑鞘已经完全不像昨天那位富豪贵族身上所佩戴的那只了。你只要动点巧劲，就能给物品改头换面，甚至连它们的主人都认不出来！
After performing a Perfect dodge (a dodge in the window for a Perfect block) you get a 15 % weapon attack bonus. The effect lasts for 5 seconds.
成功地完美闪避（即在完美格挡窗口期使出闪避）后，你的武器攻击伤害提升15 %，效果持续5秒。

The Dance of death is a scene that reminds the living of the temporality and impermanence of their stay on earth. You are well aware of this, and have mastered the art of sending your opponents into this dance while remaining aloof, for the time being.
“死亡之舞” 时刻提醒着人们世事无常、生命短暂。你很清楚这一点，并且引诱对手跳此舞，自己却置身事外，你深谙此道——至少眼下还是这样。
Rearing your horse frightens your enemies much more than before.
扬起马蹄时，对敌人的威吓效果相较之前显著变强。
As the medieval saying goes, the city air is liberating.
正如谚语所说，城里的空气都有自由的味道。

The required Strength for all weapons will be 2 less for you. In general, if you have a lower strength than the weapon requires, you will do less damage with it. Conversely, if your strength is higher, you'll do more damage. With this perk, you'll reach that state sooner.
使用所有武器所要求的力量值降低2点。通常来说，如果你的力量值未达到武器要求，使用该武器造成的伤害将减少。反之，若你的力量高于武器的要求，则会造成更多的伤害。此天赋能让你更快适应不同武器。

The required Strength for all weapons will be 5 lower for you. In general, if you have a lower Strength than the weapon requires, you will do less damage with it. On the other hand, if it's higher, you'll do slightly more damage. With this perk, you'll reach that state sooner.
使用所有武器所需的力量降低5点。通常来说，如果你的力量未达到武器要求，使用该武器造成的伤害将减少。反之，若你的力量高于武器的要求，则会造成更多的伤害。此天赋能让你更快适应不同武器。
A heavy cavalry charge is perhaps the most terrifying thing that can befall a man on the battlefield. Even a lone rider charge is a terrifying experience.
战场之上，最令人惊惧之事就是迎头面对骑士冲锋。就连单枪匹马的冲锋也能让人感到心惊肉跳。
To execute a master strike, you need to attack at the moment your opponent strikes, but from the opposite zone of their attack. This will stop their attack and land your own hit.
要使出大师一击，你需要在对手进攻的瞬间发起攻击，但要注意应从对方攻击的反方向进攻，这将使你在阻断他们攻击的同时击中他们。
The principle of the master strike, a simultaneous block and attack, can also be used unarmed against an unarmed opponent.
同时进行格挡与进攻乃大师一击的精髓，这一招式同样可在徒手时用于应对同样徒手的对手。

Being outnumbered is usually fatal for knights. However, you weren't taught to fight by masters of the court. You taught yourself, through each defeated opponent, and can handle being outnumbered. Don’t let enemies get behind you, wear them down, and take them out one by one.
对骑士来说，人数劣势往往是致命的。但你不是宫廷大师教出来的迂腐学生，你是在实战中自学成才，每打败一个对手就积累一分经验，所以你能处理以少敌多场面。只要不让敌人绕到你的背后，你就可以拖垮他们，逐个击破。
Looking like an intrepid hero of legends is the first step to performing heroic deeds. And that's the first step to entering into legend.
模仿传说中的英雄形象是创造英雄事迹的第一步，也是成为传奇的第一步。
If you use a quick start $sprint; $sprint;, your horse will briefly run faster than the wind! The effect will last 10 seconds.
如果你使用快速起步$sprint; $sprint;，你的马短时间内会跑得比风还快！效果持续10秒。
When using the fast start $sprint; $sprint;, the horse will start even faster than before and will not lose stamina. The effect will last 10 seconds.
如果你使用快速起步$sprint; $sprint;，你的马将起步更快，并且不会失去耐力，效果持续10秒。
Forward, my faithful steed! We have much to do and no time to waste!
冲啊，我忠诚的小马，我们还有很多事情要做，不能再浪费时间了！

The one who stands at the head of the formation and is the first to meet the enemy usually earns the greatest glory. That is often your place, where you have learned how to properly defend and conserve your strength in battle.
先锋最先迎敌且通常能赢得最显赫的战功。你常担任先锋，因此利用实战经验，掌握了有效防御的方法和节省体力窍门。
Mutt's obedience will decrease 25 % slower over time.
呆呆的服从度下降速度减缓25 %。
You gain +1 to Strength, Agility and Vitality for every 15 seconds you are in combat. The maximum you can achieve is +5.
身处战斗时，每15秒你的力量、敏捷和活力将获得1点加成。最大加成可达5点。
Beer sates you twice as much, so if you’re not afraid of drunkenness, you can more easily replace food with it. However, potions sate you half as much, so you can drink more of them.
啤酒提供的饱腹感翻倍，如果你不怕喝醉的话，甚至可以用啤酒代替食物。但是，药水提供的饱腹感减半，因此你可以喝下更多的药水了。
Compared to modern lagers, medieval beer had a thicker consistency and lower alcohol content, so it could partially replace food. It is not for nothing that they say "Eat your beer!".
与现代的淡啤酒相比，中世纪的啤酒更加醇厚，酒精含量更低，因此可以在某种程度上替代食物。也难怪那时人们会说：“吃你的啤酒去！”

随着力量的提升，你的负重能力也能提升得更快。每提升1级力量，你的负重将提升12磅而非通常的10磅。
If you fight with a short sword (not a hunting sword or saber) its defense will be 30 % higher and your attacks and blocks will cost you 20 % less stamina.
如果你使用短剑（而非猎刀或军刀）战斗，防御提升30 %，攻击和格挡的耐力消耗降低20 %。

虽然短剑的攻击范围不及长剑，但它灵活且有多种用途，所以非常适合作为副武器或者与盾牌一同使用。

Riding over open terrain is a demanding discipline that only experienced riders dare to take on.
在开阔地形骑行是项要求很高的运动，只有经验老道的骑手才敢尝试。

训犬和马术所获取的经验提高20 %。你将进步更快。
Saint Francis of Assisi included animals as well as people in his concept of fraternity. You share this conviction with the great thinker.
亚西西的圣方济各将动物和人类一同纳入他博爱的理念之中，而你与这位伟大的思想家有着同样的理念。

你的手工艺和偷窃技能将得到更快提升，获取的所有经验提高20 %。

Man is, as Aristotle says, a social creature. He lives, thrives and develops in the company of others. You live in accordance with this teaching because you yourself admire the works of human hands, their endless ingenuity and their desire to arrange and change things.
正如亚里士多德所言，人是一种社会性生物。人们在他人的陪伴中生活、成长并得到发展。你也遵循着这一原则，因为你欣赏人类的造物、他们无尽的智慧，还有其做出整顿和改变的愿望。

正如老普林尼一般，你对人类周遭的自然世界怀揣着热爱之情。它激发了你的好奇心，你在其中觅见了内心的平静、庇护与智慧源泉。
Your Strength will make it easier to win fights in the clinch, because it will be harder for your opponent to react to your actions.
你的力量能助你在缠斗中更轻松地赢得战斗，因为对手很难应对你的招式。
When you're drunk, life is just somehow nicer. The bonuses of the positive phase of drunkenness come into full effect earlier.
喝醉后，生活似乎变得更美好。醉酒的正面效果阶段发挥其最强效果来得更早。
Bad day? Have a beer and you'll feel better. Got an important assignment coming up? Tip one back for courage. Just got robbed of everything you own? Beer is the poor man's bread and also a cure-all!

The inhabitants of the nomad camp are an eclectic mix of people. Other than the Voivode and his family, there are several merchants, horse traders, a group of foreigners and a handful of wanderers and vagrants from God knows where.
游牧民营地中的居民都是形形色色的人。除了司令官和他的家属，还有一些商人、马贩、许多外国人，以及一些来历不明的流浪汉和游牧民。
The residents of the Hangman's Halter tavern in Kuttenberg, located in the Tarmark within sight of the pillory. The innkeeper Schönpetr, the alemaids and regular guests.
绞索酒馆位于库滕堡的塔马克，附近可看到颈手枷，酒馆中居民包括店主谢恩彼得、女侍和常客。
The castle's lord, Otto Von Bergow, and his closest subjects - Chamberlain Ulrich, Erazim the scribe, Burgrave Hashek and Captain Thomas, noble guests and members of high scoiety living at Trosky.
领主奥托·冯·波尔高及其亲信——管家乌尔里希、抄写员埃拉兹姆、城伯哈舍克和托马斯队长，贵族宾客以及居住在特罗斯基的上流人士。

The art of transmutation, i.e. the knowledge of the right combination of substances and their transformation into higher and nobler forms.

To make the alchemical process successful, it is necessary to observe the correct cooking time. The greater your Alchemy skill, the more you can deviate from in without repercussions. In addition, to achieve truly masterful potions, you will need to follow the recipe procedure exactly and have the ingredients as fresh as possible.

You will gain experience by brewing potions, and the more precisely you follow the procedure, the more experience you will gain.

炼金乃物质转化的艺术，是种将物质正确结合以及将它们转化为更优质、更贵重形态的学识。

正确把控炼制时间是决定炼金流程成功与否的关键。你的炼金技能越高，承受负面影响的可能性越低。此外，要炼制真正优质的药剂，你应当严格遵循配方所示的步骤，并且尽可能使用新鲜材料。

炼制药剂可让你获得相应经验，你越是准确地遵循配方步骤，所获得的经验就越多。
盔甲锻造技能等级提升。

The art of fighting with polearms. These are the most common weapons of the medieval soldier because they are inexpensive to produce and very effective when used in large numbers, even in the hands of inexperienced fighters. However, a seasoned warrior can wield this weapon alone and take advantage of its strengths, particularly its great penetrating power and significant reach.

The higher your skill, the more powerful and faster your attacks will be.

You gain experience primarily through combat with the respective weapons.

Polearms include all long weapons, from spears, halberds and glaives to knightly poleaxes.

使用长柄武器战斗的技艺。长柄武器是中世纪士兵最常用的武器，因为它们生产成本低，而且，由大批士兵操用时极为有效，即便握在新兵蛋子手中亦是如此。而身经百战的战士则可独自使用这种武器，并懂得发挥其优势，尤其是强大的穿透力和可观的攻击距离。

你的长柄武器技能越高，攻击速度越快，攻击威力也越强。

使用相应武器进行战斗可获得长柄武器技能经验。

长柄武器包括所有长武器，比如长矛、长戟、长柄刀、长柄斧、双手骑士锤和双手斧。
武器锻造技能等级提升。

The skill of fighting with swords and similar weapons. Sword-like weapons are agile and allow you to hit your opponent accurately and quickly, as well as to effectively defend against incoming attacks. Longswords also give you the advantage of a longer reach. The biggest disadvantage of these weapons is that they are usually ineffective against heavily armoured foes.

The higher your Swordsmanship skill, the faster your attacks will be, the more damage they will do, and the harder it will be for your opponents to block them.

Swordsmanship experience is gained primarily by fighting using the appropriate weapons.

Sword-like weapons include hunting swords, short swords, longswords, and sabres.

剑术是使用剑类武器进行战斗的技能。剑是种灵活的武器，可让你迅速且精确地击中对手，还可有效防御来犯的攻击，而长剑还具有攻击距离的优势。但此类武器最大的缺点则是难以应付身披重甲的敌人。

你的剑术技能等级越高，攻击速度越快，所造成的伤害也越高，且敌人也将更难格挡你发动的攻击。

使用相应武器进行战斗可获得剑术技能经验。

剑类武器包括猎刀、短剑、长剑以及军刀。
长柄兵器技能等级提升。
徒手格斗技能等级提升。
